---
format: typst
params:
  species: Gentoo
---

```{r}
#| warning: false
library(dplyr)
library(tinytable)
data(penguins)

penguins |>  
  na.omit() |>
  group_by(species, sex) |> 
  summarize(mass = mean(body_mass)) |>
  tt(width = 0.7)  |> 
  setNames(c("Species","Sex","Average Mass (g)")) |>
  style_tt(i=0,bold=TRUE)  |> 
  style_tt(align="c")  |>
  style_tt(species == params$species, background = "#047075")
```
